text: Brian Austin Green Net Worth: Brian Austin Green is an American actor who has a net worth of $4 million dollars. Born July 15, 1973 in Van Nuys, California, Brian Austin Green is best known for his role as David Silver on the television series Beverly Hills, 90210 (1990-2000). Prior to his role on Beverly Hills, 90210, Green had a recurring role (1986–1989) on the hit CBS prime time soap opera Knots Landing, playing the role of Brian Cunningham, the son of Abby Cunningham Ewing (Donna Mills). He starred as a series regular in Terminator: The Sarah Conner Chronicles, Freddie, Wedding Band and Anger Management. He also guest-starred on Smallville and Desperate Housewives, as well as other television shows. Green appeared briefly in the multiple award-winning Showtime drama series Resurrection Blvd. and had a cameo on Hope & Faith, where he met Megan Fox and they started dating in 2004. In 2010, Green married actress Megan Fox. In March 2012, TMZ.com reported that celebrity photographer Delbert Shaw filed a lawsuit against Green and wife Megan Fox in Los Angeles County Superior Court for allegedly assaulting him after the took photographs of the couple while on vacation in Hawaii in 2010. In June 2012, Green claimed he was defending himself against Shaw and that his wife should not be named in the lawsuit. In August 2012 it was reported that Brian Austin Green and Megan Fox were divorcing.
